items.sentence: You're the only person who can help me do that, aren't you?
I need to send a package to my brother who lives in Boston.
Tom waited patiently for Mary to finish what she was doing.
Tom waited for Mary to come pick him up, but she never did.
Tom is going to drop Mary off at school on his way to work.
Schools should adapt to students, not the other way around.
I wonder whether Tom really wanted to go to Boston with us.
I didn't think Tom wanted to spend any more time in Boston.
Tom said that he was looking for someone who speaks French.
Tom said that he didn't know anyone who could speak French.
